trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms has accessibility support built in and provides information about your application that allows it to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms tem suporte de acessibilidade interno e fornece informações sobre o aplicativo que lhe permite trabalhar com aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications are screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade tela utilitários ampliador e revisor, utilitários de entrada de voz, teclados na tela, dispositivos de entrada alternativos e os utilitários de aprimoramento de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> classe herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe para fornecer informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Cada classe que representa uma parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>— também contém uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> para fornecer informações sobre a classe continente e executar ações em nome dos aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Há ocasiões em que você deve fornecer informações adicionais, como o nome ou descrição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de fornecer essas informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer informações de acessibilidade limitada para controles existentes, defina o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> valores de propriedade, que serão relatados para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> valores de propriedade somente em situações raras, como se você tornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a aparência de uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, você pode exigir mais informações sobre acessibilidade ou ações diferentes de acessibilidade para ser incluído no personalizados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a acessibilidade, você pode escrever sua própria classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver escrevendo uma célula de cabeçalho de linha personalizado que implementa exclusivas ações personalizadas, como o teste de clique especiais dentro de sua célula, você deve criar uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> expõe sua estrutura de dados usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> valores para definir os dados de tabela hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a exposição de tabelas de dados para acessibilidade ativa da Microsoft, consulte "Expor dados de tabelas por meio de Microsoft Active Accessibility" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the child accessible object.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do objeto filho acessível.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child accessible object corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto acessível filho correspondente para o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the child accessible object corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa o objeto filho acessível correspondente ao índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method returns an accessible object for the row of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> objects when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> is `true` and `index` is 0.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> método retorna um objeto acessível para a linha de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> objetos quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> é `true` e `index` é 0.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> is `false` and `index` is 0, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> returns an accessible object for the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> é `false` e `index` é 0, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> retorna um objeto acessível para o primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child objects belonging to an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de objetos filhos que pertencem a um objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The number of child objects belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos filhos que pertencem ao objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> method returns the number of visible rows in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, plus 1 for the column header row if it is visible and 1 for each visible scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A> método retorna o número de linhas visíveis no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, mais 1 para a linha de cabeçalho de coluna se ele estiver visível e 1 para cada barra de rolagem visível.

trans-unit.source: If there are no columns in the control, this method always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma coluna no controle, esse método sempre retorna 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the accessible object of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto acessível do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that has the current focus, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que especifica o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que tem o foco atual ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> não tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the selected cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa as células selecionadas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the currently selected cells, or <see langword="null" /> if no cells are selected or if the object itself does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa as células selecionadas no momento ou <see langword="null" /> se nenhuma célula estiver selecionada ou se o próprio objeto não tem o foco.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal screen coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada horizontal da tela.

trans-unit.source: The vertical screen coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada vertical da tela.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child object at the specified screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o objeto filho nas coordenadas da tela especificadas.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object at the given screen coordinates, or <see langword="null" /> if no object is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa um objeto nas coordenadas de tela determinadas ou <see langword="null" /> se nenhum objeto estiver no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.HitTest%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that represents part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.HitTest%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> que representa a parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If the object itself is at the specified location, this method returns the calling object.
trans-unit.target: Se o próprio objeto estiver no local especificado, esse método retorna o objeto de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> represents.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve o que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> representa.

trans-unit.source: Area clicked
trans-unit.target: Área clicada

trans-unit.source: Object represented by accessible object
trans-unit.target: Objeto representado pelo objeto acessível

trans-unit.source: Column header cell
trans-unit.target: Célula de cabeçalho de coluna

trans-unit.source: Row header cell
trans-unit.target: Célula de cabeçalho de linha

trans-unit.source: Cell
trans-unit.target: Célula

trans-unit.source: Scroll bar
trans-unit.target: Barra de rolagem

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible object name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: The accessible object name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Navega para outro objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the object positioned at the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que representa o objeto posicionado no valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.FirstChild> value to get the first child accessible object of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>, and use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.LastChild> to get the last child.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.FirstChild> valor para obter o primeiro filho objeto acessível do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>e usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.LastChild> para obter o último filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method will return `null` for all other values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> método retornará `null` para todos os outros valores da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Table" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Table" />.
